name: Trick or Treat Street
description:
Trick or Treat Street is another tiny music game, where you fly around and make beats. This time, you're a tiny ghost, in a tiny halloween land. All around there are other halloween friends that you can interact with. Simply press the space bar to say "Trick or treat!".

Play a simple ghost piano with your keyboard.

Go trick or treating to collect more candy to make sweet beats with.

Make ghostly beats with a tiny sequencer, using all the candy you've collected.

Also included is a download pack with 10 spooky phone wallpapers, and a tiny sample pack of sounds and beats to make your own music with!
